-- auto-generated definition
create table messages
(
    id      int auto_increment
        primary key,
    name    text                               not null,
    message text                               not null,
    date    datetime default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP null
);

create table users
(
    id       int auto_increment,
    login    text not null,
    password text not null,
    constraint users_pk
        primary key (id)
);


INSERT INTO mydb.users (login, password) VALUES ('admin@gmail.com', 'admin')
INSERT INTO mydb.users (login, password) VALUES ('user1@gmail.com', 'user1')
INSERT INTO mydb.users (login, password) VALUES ('user2@gmail.com', 'user2')
